Chigbu Elechi-Igwe-Membere-Otaji

The Dehumanisation of A Child

This is a collection of three separate projects centred around the absurdity of child abuse. A book titled �The Cane Behind The Door And Other Weapons Fashioned Against Us� that details objects used by abusive caregivers to beat children. Three photographs from a bigger photography series titled �I Need To Have Never Existed!�, that communicates the mental state of an abused child. A photograph called �Only Dum Dums Abuse Children!�
